sentence: In the days leading up to the congressional certification of Biden's electoral victory, Trump called on two Georgia leadersGovernor Brian Kemp and Secretary of State Brad Raffenspergerto overturn Biden's win in the state.
author: Alexandra Hutzler
title: What's Next for Trump as Judge Finds He 'Likely' Tried to Obstruct Congress

sentence: NOW WATCH: Trump rages against Brian Kemp for purportedly conspiring against Marjorie Taylor Greene
author: Matthew Chapman
title: 'Shoes dropping like hail': Here's how Jan 6 committee's 'bombshells' have gone off even before the final report
